Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.repository

Interface NotificationRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Notification,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Notification,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Notification,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Notification,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Notification,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Notification>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Notification,Integer>
@Repository public interface NotificationRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Notification,Integer>
This interface represents the notification repository, which allows us to perform CRUD operations on notification entities in the database.

  • Method Details

    • createNotification

      @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_createNotification(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5, ?6)", nativeQuery=true) int createNotification(String customerId, String providerId, String message, boolean isAccept, boolean isRead, boolean isNew)
      Creates a notification entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer receiving the notification.
      providerId - The ID of the provider associated with the notification.
      message - The message content of the notification.
      isAccept - A boolean indicating if the notification is an acceptance notification.
      isRead - A boolean indicating if the notification has been read.
      isNew - A boolean indicating if the notification is new.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created notification entry.

    • getNotificationsByCustomerId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getNotificationsByCustomerId(?1, ?2, ?3)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Notification> getNotificationsByCustomerId(String customerId, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves notifications for a customer from the database with pagination.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of notifications to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Notification objects associated with the specified customer, paginated.

    • getSpecificNotificationsByCustomerId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getSpecificNotificationsByCustomerId(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5, ?6)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Notification> getSpecificNotificationsByCustomerId(String customerId, boolean isAccept, boolean isRead, boolean isNew, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves specific notifications for a customer from the database with pagination and filtering.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      isAccept - A boolean indicating if the notification is an acceptance notification.
      isRead - A boolean indicating if the notification has been read.
      isNew - A boolean indicating if the notification is new.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of notifications to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Notification objects associated with the specified customer, filtered and paginated.

    • getNumberOfNewNotificationsByCustomerId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getNumberOfNewNotificationsByCustomerId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) int getNumberOfNewNotificationsByCustomerId(String customerId)
      Counts the number of new notifications for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      The total number of new notifications associated with the specified customer.

    • countNotificationsByCustomerId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_countNotificationsByCustomerId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) int countNotificationsByCustomerId(@RequestParam String customerId)
      Counts the number of notifications for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      The total number of notifications associated with the specified customer.

    • getNotificationsByProviderId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getNotificationsByProviderId(?1, ?2, ?3)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Notification> getNotificationsByProviderId(String providerId, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves notifications for a provider from the database with pagination.
      Parameters:
      providerId - The ID of the provider.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of notifications to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Notification objects associated with the specified provider, paginated.

    • getSpecificNotificationsByProviderId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getSpecificNotificationsByProviderId(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5, ?6)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Notification> getSpecificNotificationsByProviderId(String providerId, boolean isAccept, boolean isRead, boolean isNew, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves specific notifications for a provider from the database with pagination and filtering.
      Parameters:
      providerId - The ID of the provider.
      isAccept - A boolean indicating if the notification is an acceptance notification.
      isRead - A boolean indicating if the notification has been read.
      isNew - A boolean indicating if the notification is new.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of notifications to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Notification objects associated with the specified provider, filtered and paginated.

    • countNotificationsByProviderId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_countNotificationsByProviderId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) int countNotificationsByProviderId(String providerId)
      Counts the number of notifications for a provider.
      Parameters:
      providerId - The ID of the provider.
      Returns:
      The total number of notifications associated with the specified provider.

    • getNumberOfNewNotificationsByProviderId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getNumberOfNewNotificationsByProviderId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) int getNumberOfNewNotificationsByProviderId(String providerId)
      Retrieves the number of new notifications for a provider.
      Parameters:
      providerId - The ID of the provider.
      Returns:
      The total number of new notifications associated with the specified provider.

    • updateNotification

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_updateNotification(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5, ?6, ?7)", nativeQuery=true) void updateNotification(int id, String customerId, String providerId, String message, boolean isForProvider, boolean isAccept, boolean isRead)
      Updates a notification entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the notification to update.
      customerId - The ID of the customer associated with the notification.
      providerId - The ID of the provider associated with the notification.
      message - The updated message content of the notification.
      isForProvider - A boolean indicating if the notification is for the provider.
      isAccept - A boolean indicating if the notification is an acceptance notification.
      isRead - A boolean indicating if the notification has been read.

    • deleteNotification

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_deleteNotification(?1)", nativeQuery=true) void deleteNotification(int id)
      Deletes a notification entry from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the notification to delete.

    • countSpecificNotificationsByProviderId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_countSpecificNotificationsByProviderId(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4)", nativeQuery=true) int countSpecificNotificationsByProviderId(String providerId, boolean isAccept, boolean isRead, boolean isNew)
      Counts specific notifications for a provider.
      Parameters:
      providerId - The ID of the provider.
      isAccept - A boolean indicating if the notification is an acceptance notification.
      isRead - A boolean indicating if the notification has been read.
      isNew - A boolean indicating if the notification is new.
      Returns:
      The total number of specific notifications associated with the specified provider.

    • countSpecificNotificationsByCustomerId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_countSpecificNotificationsByCustomerId(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4)", nativeQuery=true) int countSpecificNotificationsByCustomerId(String customerId, boolean isAccept, boolean isRead, boolean isNew)
      Counts specific notifications for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      isAccept - A boolean indicating if the notification is an acceptance notification.
      isRead - A boolean indicating if the notification has been read.
      isNew - A boolean indicating if the notification is new.
      Returns:
      The total number of specific notifications associated with the specified customer.
